hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash
# Managed Inputs
mkdir data mkdir completed mkdir hierarchies mkdir processing
find data/ -type f -name "phs*" -exec rm -rf {} \;
aws s3 cp ${managed_inputs} data/
aws s3 cp s3://avillach-73-bdcatalyst-etl/general/data/metadata.json data/
csvcut -c 1,2,3,8,9 data/Managed_Inputs.csv > inputs.csv
IFS=',' [ ! -f inputs.csv ] while read abv_name stdy_id stdy_type data_ready data_processed do echo "$abv_name $data_ready $data_processed"
if [[ ${data_ready,,} == *"yes"* ]]; then if [[ ${abv_name,,} != *"ORCHID"* ]]; then #if [[ ${data_processed,,} == *"no"* ]]; then aws s3 cp s3://avillach-73-bdcatalyst-etl/${abv_name,,}/rawData/ data/ --recursive --quiet
#fi fi else echo "$abv_name not ready for processing" fi
done < inputs.csv
java -jar jars/JsonMetadataGenerator.jar
aws s3 cp completed/metadata.json s3://avillach-73-bdcatalyst-etl/general/data/
